item.title: Building Validation Methodology for Technology Without Precedent
item.description: When you’re validating first-of-a-kind technology, there’s no standard to adapt and no prior art to borrow from. Here’s how to build a methodology from scratch without either paralysis or false confidence.

item.title: The Birthmark Standard — Hardware-Backed Photo Authentication
item.description: Founded a 501(c)(3) nonprofit and designed the complete technical architecture for a privacy-preserving photo authentication system — from camera sensor fingerprinting through blockchain registration — establishing the Birthmark Media Registry as background infrastructure for validating whether images seen online actually originated from a camera.
